blocks.name: ax-groth
blocks.content: The Tarski-Grothendieck Axiom. For every set ` x ` there is an inaccessible cardinal ` y ` such that ` y ` is not in ` x ` . The addition of this axiom to ZFC set theory provides a framework for category theory, thus for all practical purposes giving us a complete foundation for "all of mathematics." This version of the axiom is used by the Mizar project ( ~ http://www.mizar.org/JFM/Axiomatics/tarski.html ). Unlike the ZFC axioms, this axiom is very long when expressed in terms of primitive symbols - see ~ grothprim . An open problem is finding a shorter equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
axiom ax-groth(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: axgroth5
blocks.content: The Tarski-Grothendieck axiom using abbreviations. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm axgroth5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3))))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  mpbir(wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3))))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))
  ax-groth(s0, s1, s2, s3, hs0)
  exbii(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3))))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  3anbi123i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3))))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  biid(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  ralbii(s2, cv(s0), wa(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3)))), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3)))))))
  anbi12i(wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3))), wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))))
  pwss(s3, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  rexbii(s3, cv(s0), wss(cpw(cv(s2)), cv(s3)), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s3)))))
  pwss(hs0, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  bitri(wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  df-ral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  albii(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  selpw(s2, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: axgroth2
blocks.content: Alternate version of the Tarski-Grothendieck Axiom. (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm axgroth2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
} = {
  mpbir(wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wex(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))
  ax-groth(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4)
  exbii(s0, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  3anbi3i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wal(s3, wi(wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wal(s4, wi(wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s3))))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), wal(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  albii(s2, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))
  pm5.74i(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  orbi1d(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)))
  syl6bb(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cen, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2))))
  biantrurd(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, cv(s0))))
  ssdomg(cv(s0), universe, cv(s2))
  sbthb(cv(s2), cv(s0))
}
